info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 5:45PM EDT until August 04 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Bennington County in southern Vermont... Southern Windham County in southern Vermont... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 545 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pownal, or near Bennington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bennington, Brattleboro, Pownal, Putney, Vernon, Wilmington, Stamford, Readsboro, Newfane, Guilford Center, Guilford, North Bennington, Whitingham, Dover, Marlboro, Halifax, Woodford, Jacksonville, Old Bennington and Searsburg. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
